Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. A lending service including leisure reading and non-fiction. Holds a large fiction collection including minor classics, local authors and 'Kwicfic', a large collection of modern paperback fiction. Also holds a constantly updated collection of bestsellers and a selection of titles from the reading group sets for reading groups to browse and borrow. Books available in large print and audio. Drama collection includes single copies and sets of plays. Language collection includes books in Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Russian, Spanish and Urdu. Activities include a Writers Resource Centre and reading groups. Provides 9 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office and internet access available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-8pm, Tues, Thurs, Fri & Sat 9.30am-5.30pm, Wed 9.30am-8pm (opening times); Wed 5.15-7.30pm (Writers Resource Centre), 1st, 3rd & 4th Wed in the month (reading groups please contact for further details)
